options.name: Improved Firebomb Potions
options.description: Firebomb Potions you craft gain an additional die of Damage and deal an additional 1d8 Damage to Structures and Constructs.

options.name: Volatile Explosives
options.description: Increase the Radius of the Firebomb Potions and Explosive Ammunition you Craft by 1 Unit

options.name: Double Improved Firebombs
options.description: Add your Alchemy Bonus Modifier to the Damage your Firebomb Potions do at the time of Crafting.

options.name: Action : Timed Fuse
options.description: When you use a Potion, you can set a fuse, delaying the activation to the end of your Turn, 1 minute or 1 Hour.

options.name: Action : Precise Throw
options.description: You throw a Firebomb Potion. Any Creature that avoids the Attack takes Splash Damage.

options.name: Controlled Chemistry
options.description: Gain +5 Fire Mitigation. Additionally, you always succeed on Checks against your Firebomb Potions.
